alert.note: Alert for South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 5:17PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Walton County through 445 PM CDT... At 417 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Cinco Bayou to near Santa Rosa Beach. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Inlet Beach, Portland, Villa Tasso, Port Washington, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Miramar Beach, Gulf Pines, Bunker, Grayton Beach, Seagrove Beach, Sandestin and Four Mile Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida.
